description: This file defines an AuthService class in Angular that handles authentication operations such as login, logout, checking authentication status, and retrieving current user information. It interacts with an API backend, manages tokens and user data through utility functions, and is injectable as a service within an Angular application.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Angular service providing authentication functionalities such as login, logout, and user state management.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs login by sending credentials to the backend, saves received token and user info, and returns an Observable of User.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears stored authentication data, effectively logging out the user.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if there is a valid authentication token present, indicating whether the user is authenticated.

methods.name: currentUser
methods.description: Retrieves the current user data if available, or null otherwise.
